revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Dusty Bowl |image = [[File:Dusty Bowl.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Dusty Bowl. |tokens = 1,570,000 |location = Between Giant's Cap and Giant's Mirror }}
<!--T:2--> '''Dusty Bowl''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 22,923,210 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
<!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Gurdurr.png|40px]] Gurdurr || rowspan=11 colspan=2| <center>N/A |- | [[File:Ferrothorn.png|40px]] Ferrothorn |- | [[File:Klang.png|40px]] Klang |- | [[File:Meowstic.png|40px]] Meowstic |- | [[File:Barbaracle.png|40px]] Barbaracle |- | [[File:Applin.png|40px]] Applin |- | [[File:Hattrem.png|40px]] Hattrem |- | [[File:Qwilfish.png|40px]] Qwilfish |- | [[File:Hitmonlee.png|40px]] Hitmonlee |- | [[File:Hitmonchan.png|40px]] Hitmonchan |- | [[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Koffing |}
<!--T:6--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Gigalith.png|50px]] Gigalith || rowspan=4| <center>114,616,050 || rowspan=4 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Flygon.png|50px]] Flygon |- | [[File:Sigilyph.png|50px]] Sigilyph |- | [[File:Tyranitar.png|50px]] Tyranitar |}
==Items== <!--T:7-->
<!--T:8--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Pokéball}} || N/A || 26.04% || 25.38% || 22.49% |- | {{Bag2|Greatball}} || N/A || 26.04% || 25.38% || 22.49% |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || N/A || 26.04% || 25.38% || 22.49% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Ochre Shard}} || N/A || 10.42% || 11.10% || 14.03% |- | {{Bag2|Grey Shard}} || N/A || 10.42% || 11.10% || 14.03% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 0.26% || 0.42% || 1.12% |- | {{Bag2|Max Revive}} || N/A || 0.26% || 0.42% || 1.12% |- | {{Bag2|Rare Bone}} || N/A || 0.26% || 0.42% || 1.12% |- | {{Bag2|Star Piece}} || N/A || 0.26% || 0.42% || 1.12% |}
